summary: This bill, H.R. 1425, proposes significant changes to the child tax credit. It aims to increase the credit amount to $5,000, eliminate income limitations, and make the credit fully refundable. The bill also includes various amendments to remove subsections and paragraphs related to the child tax credit, as well as conforming amendments and an effective date for the changes. The primary goal is to enhance the child tax credit and broaden its accessibility.
